title: Tax Filing 101
description: Why you should file taxes even if you earned $0.

content.title: The Refund Mindset
content.text: Filing taxes is the only way to receive government benefits like the GST/HST credit. Even with no income, filing ensures the CRA knows you are a resident and eligible for quarterly 'rebate' checks.

quiz.question: When is the general deadline to file your personal income tax return in Canada?
quiz.explanation: The deadline for most individuals to file their taxes is April 30th of the following year.
